name: Manager
story:
Good day! I'm your new manager, Raul. Congratulations on your outstanding performance last season! Numerous clubs are interested in your services. Some of the largest clubs in South America, Asia, and even Europe have contacted me with inquiries for you. 

It's time to make a decision on your next challenge.
nav: Press 1 to go to Europe, Press 2 to go to Asia, Press 3 to go to South America

name: Europe
story: Welcome to European football, the home of big-boy football clubs! The English Premier League and LaLiga are two of the most popular football leagues in the entire universe. The two leagues combined have over 60% of the top-flight football players from across the globe.
nav: Press 1 to go to Premier League, Press 2 to go to LaLiga, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Asia
story: Welcome to Asia, the emerging powerhouse of football. The Saudi Professional League and the Indian Super League are two of the most exciting new leagues. With top international players signing for Saudi clubs, the football scene in Asia is sure to explode.
nav: Press 1 to go to Saudi Professional League, Press 2 to go to Indian Super League, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: South America
story: Welcome to South America, the land of Pele, Maradona, and Messi! Campeonato Brasileiro Série A and Argentine Primera División are thw top two leagues in this region. The two leagues have given several legends of the game to the football folklore.
nav: Press 1 to go to Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, Press 2 to go to Argentine Primera División, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: English Premier League
story:
The Premier League is the top tier of England's football pyramid, with 20 teams battling it out for the honour of being crowned English champions.

Home to some of the most famous clubs, players, managers and stadiums in world football, the Premier League is the most-watched league on the planet with one billion homes watching the action in 188 countries.
nav: Press 1 to go to Liverpool FC, Press 2 to go to Arsenal FC, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: LaLiga
story:
Founded in 1929, La Liga has been a stage for colorful, vibrant and committed soccer.

It is a division that has come to be defined by the two biggest teams involved: Real Madrid and Barcelona. Real Madrid is the capital club and most successful side in La Liga history. Meanwhile, Barcelona seek to sample glory with an accompanying flair.
nav: Press 1 to go to Real Madrid Club de Fútbol, Press 2 to go to FC Barcelona, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Saudi Professional League
story: The Saudi Pro League, known as the Roshn Saudi League is the highest division of association football in the Saudi league system.
nav: Press 1 to go to Al Nassr Football Club, Press 2 to go to Al-Ittihad Football Club, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Indian Super League
story: The Indian Super League (ISL) is the men's highest level of the Indian football league system. Administrated by the All India Football Federation (AIFF) and commercial partner Football Sports Development Limited (FSDL) the league currently comprises 12 clubs.
nav: Press 1 to go to ATK Mohun Bagan FC, Press 2 to go to Mumbai City FC, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Campeonato Brasileiro Série A
story: The Campeonato Brasileiro is one of the strongest leagues in the world; it contains the second-most club world champions titles, with 10 championships won among six clubs, and the second-most Copa Libertadores titles, with 20 titles won among 10 clubs.
nav: Press 1 to go to Botafogo, Press 2 to go to Palmeiras, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Argentine Primera División
story: The Primera División is the country's premier football division and is the top division of the Argentine football league system. It operates on a system of promotion and relegation with the Primera Nacional (Second Division), with the teams placed lowest at the end of the season being relegated.
nav: Press 1 to go to River Plate, Press 2 to go to Talleres, Press 3 to go to previous selection

name: Liverpool FC
story: Liverpool Football Club is a professional football club based in Liverpool, England. The club competes in the Premier League, the top tier of English football. Founded in 1892, the club joined the Football League the following year and has played its home games at Anfield since its formation.

name: Arsenal FC
story: Arsenal play in the Premier League, the top flight of English football. The club has won 13 league titles (including one unbeaten title), a record 14 FA Cups, two League Cups, 17 FA Community Shields, the Football League Centenary Trophy, one European Cup Winners' Cup and one Inter-Cities Fairs Cup.

name: Real Madrid Club de Fútbol
story: Real Madrid Club de Fútbol is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain. The club was formed in 1902 as Madrid Football Club, and played its first competitive match on 13 May 1902, when it lost 3–1 in the semi-final of the Campeonato de Copa de S.M.

name: FC Barcelona
story: Futbol Club Barcelona, commonly known as Barcelona or simply Barça, is a Spanish professional football club from Barcelona, Catalonia. They currently compete in La Liga, the top division of Spanish football. It was founded in 1899 by Joan Gamper as FC Barcelona. Més que un club (in Catalan): More than a club.

name: Al Nassr Football Club
story: Al Nassr Football Club (Naṣr meaning Victory) is a Saudi Arabian professional football club based in Riyadh. Formed in 1955, the club plays its home games at the Al-Awwal Park. Their home colors are yellow and blue.

name: Al-Ittihad Football Club
story: Al-Ittihad Club Saudi Arabia (also simply known as Al-Ittihad, literally meaning The Union, is a Saudi Premier League football club based in Jeddah. Al-Ittihad has won 8 League titles and also holds 35 official championship wins, three of them being Asian championships.

name: ATK Mohun Bagan FC
story: After Kolkata Games and Sports Private Limited, the company that owned ATK FC, took an 80% stake in the football division of Mohun Bagan in 2020, it came to be known as ATK Mohun Bagan FC for sponsorship purpose. From the 2023-24 season, team was rebranded as Mohun Bagan Super Giants.

name: Mumbai City FC
story: Mumbai City FC is an Indian professional football club based in Mumbai, Maharashtra. The club competes in the Indian Super League (ISL), the top tier of Indian football league system.

name: Botafogo
story: Botafogo de Futebol e Regatas also known as Botafogo, is a Brazilian sports club based in the bairro (neighborhood) of Botafogo, in the city of Rio de Janeiro. It plays in the Campeonato Brasileiro Série A, the top tier of the Brazilian football league system, and in the state of Rio de Janeiro's premier state league.

name: Palmeiras
story: Palmeiras is one of the most popular clubs in South America, with around 21 million supporters and more than 184,679 affiliated fans. Despite being primarily a football club, Palmeiras competes in a number of different sports.

name: River Plate
story: Club Atlético River Plate, commonly known as River Plate, is an Argentine professional sports club based in the Belgrano neighborhood of Buenos Aires. Founded in 1901, the club is named after the English name for the city's estuary, Río de la Plata.

name: Talleres
story: Club Atlético Talleres mostly known simply as Talleres or Talleres de Córdoba is an Argentine sports club from the city of Córdoba. The institution is mostly known for its football team, which currently plays in the Argentine Primera División. Talleres' main rival is Belgrano: Their rivalry is known as 'el clásico cordobés'.
